sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="">709513e4836071103a0528b7480bee1b</macroponent><name>Set catalog Imge</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var model = {};
    var input = api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].cat_item._reference;
    var modelData = input.picture.displayValue;
    if (modelData != undefined) {
        model.headerImage = modelData;
        model.fieldLabel = "Test value"; //Here only to support the required structure of the object
    }
    api.setState('setImage', model);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>fc9513e44d607110fe385078a4c39510</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set catalog Imge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_fc9513e44d607110fe385078a4c39510</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
